DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of an investigational medication compared with placebo in the treatment of pain associated with endometriosis.
DOC.criteria: Menstruating female 1850 years of age, Regular cycle length of 21 to 35 days with menstrual bleeding that typically lasts no more than 7 days, Has pain associated with endometriosis, Has a documented history consistent with endometriosis, Is pregnant or lactating, Has a history of or has active thrombosis
